      • isCheckMate

        public boolean isCheckMate()
        This method will check if there is a possibility of check-mate, if there exists one, it will return true and the game will enter the EndGame mode
        Returns:
        boolean-if check-mate is found

      • promptInput

        public void promptInput()
        This method will prompt the player for input and pass the input accordingly

        public void parseIO​(int i,
                    String io)
        This method will parse what the user enters
        Parameters:
        i - - white = 1 and black = 0
        io - string that has been input by the user

      • getFileRank

        public int getFileRank​(String fromHere,
                       String moveHere)
        This method will initialize the file and rank of the pieces entered by the players
        Parameters:
        fromHere - -string that contains the departing coordinates
        moveHere - -string that contains the destination coordinates
        Returns:
        int-if input is right the global variables will be initialized
